play.title: üé∂ *Play Music*
play.description: Add a song to the queue

play.usage:
üéµ *Usage*

`!play <url or search>`

‚ú® *Examples:*
‚Ä¢ `!play https://youtube.com/...`
‚Ä¢ `!play Artist - Song Name`
‚Ä¢ `!play song name`
play.spotifyError:
‚ùå *Spotify Link Error*

Couldn't resolve this Spotify link.

üí° *Try:*
‚Ä¢ YouTube URL
‚Ä¢ Search query (song name)
play.youtubeError:
‚ùå *YouTube Link Error*

Couldn't resolve this YouTube link.

üí° *Try:*
‚Ä¢ Search query (song name)
‚Ä¢ Different YouTube URL
play.noResults:
üîç *No Results Found*

Couldn't find any matches for:
*"{input}"*

üí° *Try:*
‚Ä¢ More specific search terms
‚Ä¢ Include artist name
‚Ä¢ Use a YouTube or Spotify URL

skip.nothingPlaying:
‚è∏Ô∏è *Nothing Playing*

No song is currently playing.
skip.permissionDenied:
üîí *Permission Denied*

You can only skip your own songs.

‚ú® VIPs can skip any song.

remove.usage:
üéµ *Usage*

`!remove <number>`

üí° Use `!queue` to see the queue numbers.
remove.removed:
üóëÔ∏è *Removed*

*"{title}"* has been removed from the queue.
remove.invalidIndex:
‚ùå *Invalid Index*

That position doesn't exist in the queue.

üí° Use `!queue` to see valid numbers.

nowPlaying.nothingPlaying:
‚è∏Ô∏è *Nothing Playing*

No song is currently playing.

notifications.hint: üí° Use `!notifications on` or `!notifications off` to change your preference
notifications.enabled:
‚úÖ *Notifications Enabled*

You'll be notified when your songs are coming up!
notifications.disabled:
‚ùå *Notifications Disabled*

You won't receive upcoming song notifications.
notifications.historyCleared:
üóëÔ∏è *History Cleared*

Notification history has been reset.
notifications.usage:
üîî *Usage*

`!notifications [on|off|clear]`

‚ú® *Options:*
‚Ä¢ `on` - Enable notifications
‚Ä¢ `off` - Disable notifications
‚Ä¢ `clear` - Clear notification history

playlist.vipOnly:
üîí *VIP Only*

This feature is exclusive to VIP users.

‚ú® Contact an admin to get VIP access!
playlist.usage:
üéµ *Usage*

`!playlist <url>`

‚ú® *Supported:*
‚Ä¢ Spotify playlist links
‚Ä¢ YouTube playlist links
playlist.invalidUrl:
‚ùå *Invalid Playlist URL*

Please provide a valid:
‚Ä¢ Spotify playlist link
‚Ä¢ YouTube playlist link
playlist.empty:
üîç *Empty Playlist*

No tracks found in this playlist.

üí° Make sure the playlist is public and contains songs.
playlist.error:
‚ùå *Playlist Error*

Failed to process playlist:
*{error}*

üí° Make sure the playlist is public and accessible.

ping.notInGroup: This command only works in groups.
ping.alreadyMonitored: This group is already being monitored.
ping.pending: A request to add this group is already pending. Please check the web dashboard to confirm.
ping.requestSent: Request to add this group has been sent. Please check the web dashboard to confirm.

errors.fingerprintMismatchMessage: This link is bound to a different device.
errors.urlRequired: URL or search query is required
errors.settingNotEditable: Setting '{key}' in category '{category}' cannot be modified

mobile.noToken: No access token found in URL

dashboard.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout? This will disconnect from WhatsApp and clear all authentication data.
dashboard.logoutError: Logout error: {error}. Clearing local data and redirecting...

nowPlaying.addTrackHint: Add a track to get started

notifications.skipConfirm: Are you sure you want to skip the current track?
notifications.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this track from the queue?
notifications.newSessionConfirm: Are you sure? This will stop the current song, clear the entire queue, and reset all session statistics.

effects.title: Audio Effects
effects.simpleModeHint: Use the quick adjustment buttons above to tweak effects, or switch to Advanced mode for full control.

vip.enterPassword: Enter password to manage priority users
vip.subtitle: Priority queue for selected users
vip.removeVipMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {displayId} from VIP?

logs.clearAllLogsMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all logs? This action cannot be undone.

download.title: Download
download.description: Configure audio format, quality, and download behavior
download.audioFormatDesc: Output format for downloaded audio files
download.audioQualityDesc: Bitrate for audio encoding. Higher = better quality, larger files
download.playerClientDesc: Client to emulate when fetching from YouTube
download.downloadThumbnailsDesc: Save album artwork alongside audio files

playback.title: Playback
playback.cleanupAfterPlayDesc: Automatically delete audio files after playback completes
playback.confirmSkipDesc: Show confirmation dialog before skipping songs
playback.showRequesterNameDesc: Display the requester's name on the currently playing song

performance.title: Performance
performance.prefetchNextDesc: Download upcoming songs before they're needed
performance.prefetchCountDesc: Number of songs to preload ahead (0 = all queued songs)
performance.proTipText: Enable prefetch with count 2-3 for smooth playback without using too much storage.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.enabledDesc: Send WhatsApp messages when songs are about to play
notifications.notifyAtPositionDesc: Alert users when their song reaches this queue position (1 = next up)
notifications.howItWorksText: When enabled, the person who requested a song gets a WhatsApp message when their song is about to play.

audio.title: Volume Normalization
audio.description: Automatically adjust song volumes to consistent levels
audio.enabledDesc: Automatically analyze and adjust song volumes based on configured thresholds
audio.thresholdTooLowDesc: Songs below this level will be boosted to the target level
audio.thresholdOkDesc: Lower bound of acceptable volume range
audio.thresholdTooHighDesc: Songs above this level will be reduced to the target level
audio.targetLevelDesc: Target RMS level for normalized songs
audio.howItWorksText: When a song is downloaded, its volume level is analyzed. Songs that are too quiet or too loud are automatically adjusted to match your target level. For example, a song at -25 dB will be boosted by 13 dB to reach the -12 dB target.
audio.thresholdGuideText:
Too Low: Songs quieter than this threshold will be boosted.
OK: Songs in this range are acceptable but may be fine-tuned.
Too High: Songs louder than this threshold will be reduced.
Target: The desired volume level for all normalized songs.
audio.statisticsDesc: View analysis status for your music library
audio.manualAnalysisDesc: Re-analyze a specific song by its ID

groups.title: Monitored Groups
groups.description: Manage WhatsApp groups the bot listens to
groups.addGroupDesc: Manually add a group by its WhatsApp ID (ends with @g.us)
groups.howToAddText: Send !ping in any WhatsApp group you want to add. The request will appear here for confirmation. You can also manually add groups using the form above.
groups.invalidGroupIdMessage: Group ID must be a WhatsApp group ID (ending with @g.us)
groups.addGroupMessage: Add group "{groupId}" to monitoring? The bot will start listening to messages from this group.
groups.removeGroupMessage: Are you sure you want to remove "{groupName}" from monitoring? The bot will stop listening to messages from this group.
groups.confirmGroupMessage: Add "{groupName}" to monitored groups? This group was requested by {senderName}.
groups.failedToAddRetry: Failed to add group. Please try again.
groups.failedToRemoveRetry: Failed to remove group. Please try again.
groups.failedToConfirmRetry: Failed to confirm group. Please try again.

privacy.demoModeDesc: Blur WhatsApp IDs and group IDs for safe screen recording and demos

system.title: System Control
system.description: Manage session state and system maintenance
system.languageDesc: Choose your preferred language for the web interface
system.newSessionDesc: Clear the current queue, stop playback, and reset all statistics. Use this when starting a fresh event or day.
system.warningText: Starting a new session is destructive. All playback history, stats, and the current queue will be cleared immediately.
system.diskUsageError: Failed to load disk usage information

footer.resetAllConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This cannot be undone.
footer.footerNote: Changes apply instantly. Server settings require .env edit and restart.

addTrack.title: Add Track
addTrack.songUrlPlaceholder: Paste YouTube/Spotify URL or search by name...

auth.scanQR: Scan the QR code with your phone to link your WhatsApp account
auth.generatingQR: Generating QR code... Please wait a moment
